message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500. I believe this is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm!  While I see the value in this product, I'm looking to get it for a bit closer to $8,000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $8,500?

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still not willing to go down to $8,500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $9,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high.  How about we settle on $8,750? It's a good compromise and a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand that we're getting close, but I'm still not comfortable going up to $8,750. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $9,200. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
